item.title: Comment on Wednesday assorted links by Average Joe
item.description:
Re: #1, it's pretty disingenuous to call this "gender bias."

A simpler explanation:

1) no pronouns = neutral to perception of applicant

2) she/her or he/his = code for leftist political affiliation, but this may not add any signal, depending on other elements of their resume, and will be a positive for some number of hiring managers

3) they/them = code for emotional instability & stronger alignment w/political left
